data.title: Contact Us
data.meta_description: Contact Community Bank, N.A. for all your banking needs. Community Bank, N.A. is a full-service bank in New York, Pennsylvania, Massachusetts and Vermont.
data.text:
Need to get in touch? We're all ears. Here you'll find answers to common questions, self-service tools and contact information for anything else you need.

Visit a Branch

Schedule an appointment

Need to talk to a branch manager in your area? Schedule an appointment online to speak one-on-one with a CBNA banker.

Customer Care Center

M-F 8am-6pm: 1-866-764-8638

International Callers: 1-315-229-3775

To request a call back, click below.

Report potential fraud

Lost or stolen debit/ATM card? Notify your local branch immediately, call Customer Care or contact us through your online or mobile banking account.

—

Customer Care Center: 1-866-764-8638

Need to cancel your card after hours? Call our automated line: 1-888-297-3416

International callers: 1-206-352-4990

Bank by phone

Check your balance, transfer money, and make loan payments any time of the day.

1-800-991-4280

Loan center

Trouble making your payment? Please call us.

—

Residential Loans and Lines: 1-888-907-1171

Consumer Loans and Lines: 1-800-682-3982

Find an address

Click to view our mailing addresses for loan payments, document processing and more.

Share your feedback

We want to know what you think. Drop us a note to let us know how we're doing so we can better serve you.

General questions

Email us at corpcom@cbna.com or click below to fill out the form.
